summary: HAVE HAD FRONT END / ROTOR PROBLEMS REPORTED @ 6715MILES, 10,806 MILES, 21,060 MILES AND 24,179 MILES. IT IS UNREASONABLEFOR ROTORS TO NEED TO BE RESURFACED OR REPLACED 4 TIMES IN LESS THAN 25,000 MILES. OBVIOUSLY SOMETHING IS DEFECTIVE CAUSING THEM TO FAIL. THIS IS A MAJOR SAFETY CONCERN FOR ME AND MY CHILDREN.*AK
